title: Grotesque MT Extra Condensed
content: Does anyone know a free font which is as close to Grotesque MT Extra Condensed as possible?
author: benbacardi

comments.content:
Hi Ben,

[FAQ Free](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226065925/http:/typophile.com/wiki/FAQ%20Free).

Besides: I see you are a student.  
Have a look at this: [Font Folio Education Essentials](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226065925/http:/blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2008/03/ffee.html) by Adobe, in cooperation with AIGA. Youâ€™ll get not only Grotesque MT Extra Condensed, but the whole family, plus another 490 top-notch fonts. $149 should really be a bargain.

The only good condensed Grothesque for free i know, is EF Alternate Gothic No. 2  
 [https://ssl.kundenserver.de/www.elsner-flake-shop.com/sess/utn;jsessioni...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120226065925/https:/ssl.kundenserver.de/www.elsner-flake-shop.com/sess/utn;jsessionid=15481eefbb29696/shopdata/index.shopscript "https://ssl.kundenserver.de/www.elsner-flake-shop.com/sess/utn;jsessionid=15481eefbb29696/shopdata/index.shopscript")
